articles.title: Dakota Johnson pretty in pattern suit at Cha Cha Real Smooth premiere - Daily Mail
articles.description: The 32-year-old actress looked pretty in patterns for the premiere of her latest flick Cha Cha Real Smooth as part of the 2022 SXSW Conference and Festivals at The Paramount Theatre.
articles.content:
